title: 'You imagine the worst': People of Annecy reflect on playground attack
description: The school run in Annecy on Friday morning was not an easy one for many parents.

title: Iran is helping Russia build drone factory, White House says
description: Iran has been supplying Russia with materials to build a drone manufacturing plant that could be fully operational by early next year, the White House has said.

title: 'Backpack hero' used bag as shield to chase knifeman who stabbed British girl
description: A 24-year-old has been hailed the "backpack hero" for confronting the suspect after the stabbing of a British girl and five others in a French park - while using his bag as a shield.

title: British girl has 'woken up' after knife attack in France - Macron
description: The British girl who was left with life-threatening injuries after four children were stabbed in a knife rampage in the French Alps has "woken up" and has been watching TV, France's president has said.

title: Russian man mauled to death by tiger shark off Egypt's Red Sea coast in rare attack
description: A young Russian man was mauled to death by a shark off one of Egypt's Red Sea resorts, according to Egyptian and Russian authorities.

title: Former Italian PM Berlusconi in hospital
description: Former Italian prime minister Silvio Berlusconi has been taken to hospital in Milan.

title: Greta Thunberg takes part in her final school strike for climate - warning: 'The fight has only just begun'
description: Greta Thunberg says she is "technically" taking part in her final school strike for climate today - with a warning: "The fight has only just begun."

title: Cyclists to be forced to have insurance, number plates and indicators under new laws in Italy
description: Cyclists in Italy will be made to have licence plates, indicators, insurance and wear helmets following a proposed law by its government.

title: Vatican gives update on Pope's condition after second night in hospital recovering from surgery
description: Pope Francis had a second good night in hospital following his abdominal surgery, the Vatican has said.

title: Airline changes its gender-based uniform rules
description: Qantas has become the latest airline to relax gender-based uniform rules as it allows staff to wear make-up and have long hair regardless of sex.

title: 'This kind of thing never happens here': Residents shaken after playground stabbing
description: "This kind of thing never happens here."
